long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Grammar Checker is a Chrome extension that helps you review and improve grammar and spelling in multiple languages using OpenAI's API. Perfect for professionals, students, and anyone who wants to ensure the quality of their writing in various languages.

Features:

Multi-Language Grammar Correction: Supports grammar correction in Spanish, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Indonesian, Polish, Vietnamese, Javanese, and Turkish.
Automatic Language Detection: The extension automatically detects the text's language and adjusts corrections accordingly.
Error Highlighting Without Changing Original Text: Errors are underlined with a dashed line, and hovering over them shows a correction suggestion. This allows users to view errors without altering the original content.
Simple and User-Friendly Interface: Features an intuitive interface where you can input text, review errors, and copy the result.
Support for Long Texts: Review texts of up to 2500 words, making it ideal for any type of project.
API Customization: You can securely enter and save your OpenAI API key.
How to Use Grammar Checker:

Click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar to open Grammar Checker.
Enter your text in the input field (up to 2500 words).
Click Check Grammar to receive correction suggestions.
Errors will appear underlined with a dashed line. Hover over the error to see the suggestion.
You can copy the original or corrected text by clicking Copy corrected text.

Requirements:

OpenAI API Key: To use the extension, you need an OpenAI API key. You can obtain a key at: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
Google Chrome Browser: The extension is developed and optimized for Google Chrome.
Privacy: Please note that all text processed is sent to the OpenAI API for corrections. We recommend not entering sensitive or private information.

Support and Contact: If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to us. We appreciate your feedback to continuously improve the user experience.
